name: Modern Australis
description: A userChrome tweak to make Firefox's Australis tabs into nice, simple rectangles, following Microsoft's Windows 10 UI design. Currently only works properly on Windows 10 but may work on lower versions.
additional_info:
GitHub Project: https://github.com/MrGForse/ModernAustralis

To-Do List


    -Future proof by removing '-moz' prefixes.
    -Either remove tab separators completely or use default separators.
    -Fix windowed mode tab sizes (Hover tab is slightly taller than active tab).
    -Create OS specific files, OSX and Ubuntu don't look that great.

Can be used with Stylish or userChrome.css.
